channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Mobile Unit faces a series of odd challenges that only Orla knows how to stop.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Mobile Unit must teach the agents in the Odd Squad Arctic office how to solve a case for themselves.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Learn how the heroes became Ladybug and Cat Noir.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Winx Club - The Magic Is Back
channel.desc: Following a scary encounter with a magic creature on her 16th birthday, Bloom discovers that she has magical powers. She is rescued by two fairies from Alfea School for Fairies and Witches.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve Backshall tracks cheetahs across Zambia by motorbike, witnessing epic hunting and the challenges faced by this endangered predator.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Michelle learns the truth about Chloe's financial situation. The dancers compete for the solo spot in the regionals routine.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: Steve Backshall meets the most sinister shark in our seas. The ragged tooth shark has a mouth that's overflowing with terrifying teeth. But why does it need such gnarly gnashers? Steve heads out on a dive after dark to see these fearsome fangs for himself, before revealing their sinister secret in his shark lab.
